reviewText: Yes,a very exciting Bruckner performance by the best Bruckner conductor. I have heard this symphony many times in concert halls and on cd. But in this performance I have discovered some new things, which I have never heard before. He has a lot of attention to detail. It's nice that now symphonies 3-9 by Christian Thielemann are available. So, we have only to wait for the first 2 symphonies.
Excellent!  Beatiful and meditative rendering of the last symphony of the Master. Of the "major" symphonies of Bruckner with Thielemann and Dresden we lack the 6th only.
